name: The Orchid's Edge
description:
'The Orchid's Edge' is a third-person Combat Action platformer where you play as Willow, a Dryad Spirit Reaper who defends the souls of the forest from being harvested by a kind of mechanical invader known as the Clunkers. Using her scythe The Wild Orchid, she protects the cycle of life and death in the forest.

Will you save the souls, or will you fail?

Controls: 

JUMP (Space, A)

ATTACK (Left Mouse, X)

DODGE (Right Mouse, B)

LOCK-ON (Middle Mouse, Right Stick Click) [Note: You can switch targets by scrolling the wheel, or by flicking the stick to the left or right]

The Standalone version is the definitive version due to graphical issues, but the Web Version should be fine as well.

UPDATE: Just uploaded a new version of the game that mentions the lock-on mechanic. Sorry about that!

"They'll regret ever having come here."

The Clunkers. Where did they come from?

Graphics/ Programming -  @Cornf_Blue

Music/ Sound Design.  - @CFY98

Note: Collect 50 Plant Souls and win! There are more than 50 in the game world, so don't worry about missing a couple.

Thank you!
